title: Perfect tomato pasta sauce
ingredients: ['2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '2 sticks celery, with leaves, chopped', '2 carrots, peeled and chopped', '1 small red onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic', '85g tomato puree', '475ml water', '475ml red wine', '1 teaspoon dried sage', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '1 tablespoon dried oregano', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
